content: nautilus 1954 is a washington-based & growing community of knitters and crocheters that have taken the mission to express gratitude and love to our united states navy submarine fleet through handknit & crocheted wool hats find us on facebook nautilus1954 & instagram @nautilus_1954 for more information nautilus 1954 watch cap yarn requirements 100g worsted weight 100% superwash wool sample knit in berroco ultra wool needles us 7 16 circular needles or size to obtain gauge finished size & measurements gauge is approximately 20 stiches and 22 row = 4 the finished folded-brim hat is approximately 9 tall and a 20 circumference in adult large abbreviations co cast on k knit p purl pm place marker ssk slip slip knit k2tog knit 2 together pattern co 96 104 stitches place marker and join for working in the round being careful to not twist the stitches brim *k p k p k3 p* repeat until the end of round continue in pattern until brim measures 6 body knit in stockinette for 2 75 3 25 total length for brim & body = 8 75 9 25 from cast on edge decreases set-up round *k24 26 stitches pm* repeat until the end of round round 1 *ssk knit until 2 stiches before marker k2tog* repeat until the end of round round 2 knit all stitches repeat rounds 1 & 2 until 16 stiches remain next round *ssk k2tog* repeat until end of round finishing break yarn and secure remaining 8 stitches block & weave in ends
